item.title: How to Eat Healthy Without Thinking, Backed by Science
item.description: How to Eat Healthy Without Thinking, Backed by Science 1. [[Use Smaller Plates]]. Bigger plates mean bigger portions. And that means you eat more.

item.title: Make water more readily available

item.title: Only Shop on the Outer Perimeter of the Store
item.description: Only Shop on the Outer Perimeter of the Store This is usually where the healthy food lives: fruits, vegetables, lean meats, fish, eggs, and nuts.

item.title: Why Do We Get Dark Circles Under Our Eyes? - YouTube
item.description: Why Do We Get Dark Circles Under Our Eyes? - YouTube Rubbing eyes irritates blood vessels in face, causing eyebags Bursting blood vessels in the eyelids (darker blood causes shadows) References (References:: Why do we get dark circles under our eyes?

item.description: The Case for US [[Healthcare]] My number one “unpopular opinion” that is actually extremely popular is that the US health care status quo is pretty good for most people.

item.title: Protein is Not Protein. Here's Why - YouTube

item.title: Did People Used To Look Older? - YouTube
item.description: Did People Used To Look Older? - YouTube We Actually Are Aging Slower Advances in healthcare, [[Sunscreen]], and Orthodontics The changes in “old” ages and “new” ages 60 became 56 40 became 37.

item.title: Shorter People Live Longer
item.description: Shorter People Live Longer Studies show that men below 5’ 9" live on average 4.95 years longer than men above 5’ 9".
